sentences.english: Bias affects the overshoot or undershoot of the motion through the keyframe.
sentences.chinese: 偏見影響過頭或欠該議案通過關鍵幀。

sentences.english: Japan's parliament has passed legislation to upgrade the country's defense agency into a full ministry.
sentences.chinese: 日本國會通過議案，將日本防衛廳升級爲省。

sentences.english: Finally, he incorporated some compromises suggested by others into a specific motion.
sentences.chinese: 最後，他整合了一些各個方面建議，得出折衷議案。

sentences.english: Finishing strokes in Swedish massage involve swooping around the body in a butterfly motion.
sentences.chinese: 瑞典按摩整理招涉及身體周圍的蝴蝶飛在議案。

sentences.english: In this suggestion, I target two kinds of potential stakeholders. One is sponsor;
sentences.chinese: 本建議案中，我將目標鎖定爲兩羣潛在的利害關係者。

sentences.english: They have now shattered the record for the highest number of filibusters in history.
sentences.chinese: 他們已經打破了歷史上阻礙議案通過的最高記錄。

sentences.english: The motion is detected by 32 active and passive near-infrared sensors.
sentences.chinese: 該議案是由32個檢測主動和被動的近紅外傳感器。

sentences.english: They stuck out against the motion of reducing the spendings.
sentences.chinese: 他們堅決反對削減開支的議案。

sentences.english: Democrats generally endorse the cap-and-trade plan in the bill.
sentences.chinese: 民主黨人普遍贊同議案中的限制和貿易計劃。

sentences.english: The administration has signaled it would veto the Smith bill.
sentences.chinese: 政府已經表態將會否決史密斯的提議案。

sentences.english: The council discussed the proposed law on taxes.
sentences.chinese: 委員會討論了所提的稅法議案。

sentences.english: The measure is advancing toward a final vote late Thursday, Christmas Eve.
sentences.chinese: 這項議案將於聖誕節的除夕夜星期四表決。

sentences.english: Republicans have the right to filibuster under centuries-old rules that this page has long defended.
sentences.chinese: 長久以來的慣例是，共和黨人有阻撓議案通過的權利。

sentences.english: The cotton farmers lobbied this bill through.
sentences.chinese: 棉農通過遊說使這一議案得以通過。

sentences.english: His proposal doesn't sit well with manager of the department。
sentences.chinese: 他的議案不太合部門經理的意。

sentences.english: But Mr. Bush is not vetoing all spending that is above his budget .
sentences.chinese: 不過布什並沒有否決所有超出其預算的指出議案。

definition: to remove sb from their post/to dismiss
